summary: skam france: Jeudi 17h49-Vendredi 17h05: Lucas opening up to friends
title: skam france: Jeudi 17h49-Vendredi 17h05: Lucas opening up to friends
body:
This season has been a roller coaster for Lucas and his relationships, romantic and platonic, so far. Firstly he has to come to terms with himself, and then he has to choose how he wants to present himself to the world. Season 3 has been a great way to explore how relationships can change, both temporarily and permanently. 

We’ve seen him distancing himself from the boys and getting closer to the girls, always on the periphery of both. His friends know something’s up with him but they aren’t going to force him to open up. He’s trying to escape his problems by hanging out with his friends, but they’re only a reminder of them. So he ends up pulling away. He gets to ignore his problems for a while with the girls but it’s just a bandaid to his hurt. 

He blew everyone off and put all his attention on Elliott, who he thought was his safe place, the one person he could completely be himself with. Though, as of Jeudi 17h49 and up to Vendredi 17h05, it seems that was a bust. 

So how has Lucas handled communicating with his friends?

  1. (Jeudi 17h49) Lucas tried opening up about Elliott to Mika, but ended up sticking his foot in his mouth. 
  2. (Vendredi 19h21) Lucas said that his problem had nothing to do with Yann and that Yann couldn’t understand it, then got into a fight with the boys and stormed off.
  3. (Lundi 14h03) Lucas told Yann that he would come to him when he was either ready to talk or had solved his issues on his own. 
  4. (Mercredi 13h37) Lucas took a break from the drama to hang with the girls.
  5. (Jeudi 1h48) He didn’t talk but shared a vulnerable moment with Manon.
  6. (Vendredi 9h14) He went to the school nurse, a stranger and authority figure, to ask for help with his insomnia.
  7. (Vendredi 17h05) He told Yann that he was in love with Elliott. 

(I’m not including Chloe in this post.) 

He told Mika, but that blew up in his face. He had a moment with Manon. He reached outside his group of friends for help. Then he told Yann and that also blew up in his face. 

Lucas has been holding himself back so tightly for so long. He’s come along and he’s had setbacks. But ultimately, there’s hope for out Lucas, he’s getting better about facing himself and his friends.

summary: Another aspect in which I find today’s Lucas-Yann interaction (and its heartbreaking outcome) really interesting from a viewing...
body:
Another aspect in which I find today’s Lucas-Yann interaction (and its heartbreaking outcome) really interesting from a viewing standpoint is how it counterbalances perfectly Lucas and Manon’s last exchange.

“Come, let’s not talk about it” was about finding comfort and support in each other’s presence without having to say anything, while today “I can’t help you” was the exact opposite: Lucas voicing everything, and ending up all alone.

summary: Hmm
body:
Hmm

Ok so I never really say anything, I just reblog or heart someone’s post that I agree with but I just wanna put an opinion out. To be honest I don’t have a set opinion about the coming out scene since I wanna see how it plays out. But I’ve been thinking and I think that the ending of this season is going to be the most….liberating? The biggest victory? Something like that. Hear me out.

Lucas seems like the angriest and loneliest version of Isak and this episode was much sadder and heartbreaking than the og in my opinion (not shading the og, it’ll always be that bitch and the best in my heart). Especially since the coming out scene with Jonas was Isaks hope and his light after all that shit. But Lucas feels like he has no one, life is fucking shitting on him. It seems like it won’t ever get better and he’s probably drowning in self hate and all that shit. No matter what your situation is, a lot of people feel like that, like there’s no light at the end of the tunnel and that it won’t ever get better.

But we all know that in the end Lucas will be the happiest boy and have his boyfriend and his friends and found family. We know that he finds the light at the end of the tunnel and is finally happy and free. Love always wins. Which is why it’ll be the most satisfying and liberating because it seemed so hopeless but in the end there was light at the end of his seemingly endless and terrifying tunnel. He will get through the horrible pain he’s going through and that’s so inspiring to so many people. So many people feel hopeless, like they’re life has no purpose and that they’re gonna suffer forever. But in reality they won’t suffer forever and Lucas’ story will prove that. Isaks and Martinos did too, it’s just that this one hurts more. This story just shows more pain, which could be better or worse, it’s all up to opinion.

I hate that Lucas is going through this, I wish he had the happy coming out scene but I’m positive that in the end it’ll be the most rewarding and relieving when he’s happy and is surrounded by love. It gives me hope as well that even though me and Lucas are not going through the same things, that no matter how bad things are and no matter how much pain I’m in, it won’t last forever and you will find hope and happiness. Because no sadness will last forever and everyone needs to know that.

So yeah this is messy and all over the place and probably no one will understand and y’all will probably disagree but I just wanted to say this.

summary: Okaaaaay I made a post a few days ago about how when Lucas comes out he is going to have people who support him,and while I do...
body:
Okaaaaay I made a post a few days ago about how when Lucas comes out he is going to have people who support him,and while I do still believe that I actually did not see this coming with Yann. For me it was a slap in the face and I actually struggle to look at gifs from the whole scene because it gets to me way too much, I tear up and my heart breaks. And so much have been said already about it so I will wait till the whole season is out to comment on it because I obviously believe that there is a resolution that will make us happy.

And about Lucas,damn all my respect to you and anyone going through similar things. I admire you so much and the strength you possess is stronger than the things trying to break you! <3

summary: What did we learn from last episode?
body:
What did we learn from last episode?

I just wanted to send a message to everyone that is empathizing so much with Lucas. There are times you feel like him, lonely, not loved and so on…for those times I want you to remember all the support that Lucas is receiving these days from the fandom without even knowing it. I want you to remember that YOU ARE NOT ALONE, YOU ARE LOVED. You are not less that Lucas and you deserve the same support you are now giving Lucas. 💗

summary: Aftermath of Vendredi 17h05
title: Aftermath of Vendredi 17h05
body:
I have faith in my boy, Yann. He was an ass, but he is redeemable, and this is my take on that I guess

You can also read it on ao3

—-

The reason Lucas waited this long to tell Yann about his sexuality wasn’t that he thought he would be dismissed or receive a bad reaction, but because telling him would make it real. He would have to admit to himself that he was gay. No one knowing that he was gay was simpler, because it made it easier for him to pretend he wasn’t.

“It’s not a girl” Lucas said, “does it shock you?” Nervous was an understatement.
“But, it’s not me?” “No” Lucas could see how relieved Yann looked after he told him that he wasn’t in love with him, and how he tensed up again when he told him that he previously thought he was. Lucas proceeded to tell him about Eliott, and he looked interested to know, his eyes were soft as Lucas told him about his new love, he looked at him with sympathy and care.

“Then I told Mika and I fucked it up” and I didn’t realize at that moment that I had lost his sympathy. “Do other people know?” Lucas told him that other people suspected, that some people looked at him like they knew. “What do you think about it?” he looked at Yann and his heart dropped. He couldn’t look him in the eyes. Lucas could feel his eyes fill up. “Say something, please. You’re my best friend.” Lucas was desperate for Yann to look him in the eyes and tell him that it was cool. That he had nothing to worry about, that he would be there no matter what.

But that never happened.

“You know what? I can’t right now. I need time.” And then he left.

—

Lucas felt empty. He was done being angry. He was exhausted, he couldn’t find it in him to be angry when Yann told him he needed time, all he felt was emptiness.

As he walked through the door to his shared apartment he went straight for the door to his old room, knocking two times before opening the door. Manon sits in his old bed, eyes as sad as they were last night. She looks up as he leans against the doorframe, arms crossed and tears threatening to spill. She puts away the book that was in her hands and lifts her duvet as an invitation for him to join her. He does.

While being held by Manons small figure, his tears finally begin to fall, and he’s shaking, trying so hard to breath. She tightens her grip and whispers soothing words, trying to calm him down. It must have worked, cause after a while his sobbing had stopped, and his breathing was heavy.

—

“Please don’t wake him, he hasn’t slept for days” voices arguing on the other side of the door woke Lucas up, his head felt heavy as pushed himself off the bed. He reached for his phone who was perfectly positioned on the nightstand to check the time, but what caught his attention was the three missed calls from Yann. His heart jumped. He was about to call him back when he heard his voice responding to Manon. He stood up so fast he got dizzy. “Do you mind me staying till be wakes up? I really need to talk to him” Lucas would’ve been lying if he said that he wasn’t nervous to hear what Yann wanted to tell him, so the steps he took towards the door were so slow, it felt like forever. Slowly opening the door, the first thing he sees is Yann sitting in the sofa, his leg jumping up and down – he was stressed, maybe nervous.

“What’s going on?” He can see Manon in the corner of his eye, but he doesn’t take his eyes off Yann. Yann stands up. “Lucas!” He looks perplexed, then he gives Manon a look; she leaves. “I need to talk to you” his voice is soft, and Lucas relaxes. “So I hear.” Yann opens his mouth and closes it a couple times, trying to find the right words. “I screwed up.” Lucas lets out a laugh as he breaks the eye contact and crosses his arms over his chest. “I shouldn’t have left you like that, Lucas. You opened up to me and I just walked away, and for that I’m so sorry, man. I- I really don’t have a good enough excuse. It was petty of me, I-… I had ben worried about you for weeks and I told you that I’d be there for you if you wanted to talk, and then you finally wanted to confide in me, and I was relieved. And… then you say that you’d talked to other people about what’s going on, and I just… ugh it’s horrible, I’m so sorry man, you came out to me and I was suddenly mad that you had told others before me, which you absolutely have a right to! But I was just really stupid dude, I’m sorry-” Yann rambled on, “And then I realized that you might think that I ran off because I was mad about you being gay or something, and then I realized how selfish I was, because this isn’t about me, and I am glad that you did have someone to confide in, even though it wasn’t me.” Lucas couldn’t hide his relief. Yanns eyes were filled with tears now, he smiled- “You are my best friend Lucas, and I’m here for you, always.” Lucas walked into Yanns arms before he could see his tears fall down. They hugged for what felt like hours, but he truly felt like he could stay there for hours more.

Yann later broke the hug and laid a hand on each of Lucas’ shoulders, he looked into his eyes with a serious expression, as if his eyes weren’t drenched in tears,

“so… Eliott, eh? He’s kind of cute”

“Shut up.”

—-

The reason Lucas waited this long to tell Yann about his sexuality wasn’t that he thought he would be dismissed or receive a bad reaction, but because telling him would make it real. He would have to admit to himself that he was gay. No one knowing that he was gay was simpler, because it made it easier for him to pretend he wasn’t.

“It’s not a girl” Lucas said, “does it shock you?” Nervous was an understatement.
“But, it’s not me?” “No” Lucas could see how relieved Yann looked after he told him that he wasn’t in love with him, and how he tensed up again when he told him that he previously thought he was. Lucas proceeded to tell him about Eliott, and he looked interested to know, his eyes were soft as Lucas told him about his new love, he looked at him with sympathy and care.

“Then I told Mika and I fucked it up” and I didn’t realize at that moment that I had lost his sympathy. “Do other people know?” Lucas told him that other people suspected, that some people looked at him like they knew. “What do you think about it?” he looked at Yann and his heart dropped. He couldn’t look him in the eyes. Lucas could feel his eyes fill up. “Say something, please. You’re my best friend.” Lucas was desperate for Yann to look him in the eyes and tell him that it was cool. That he had nothing to worry about, that he would be there no matter what.

But that never happened.

summary: Having watch the "Je peux pas t'aider" clip a second time, i think Yann reacted this way not because he's rejecting Lucas in any...
body:
Having watch the “Je peux pas t'aider” clip a second time, i think Yann reacted this way not because he’s rejecting Lucas in any way, but rather that, as he said, it’s a lot of infos for him to take at once and he really doesn’t want to say smth hurtful or the “not right thing to say” to Lucas, even more that their friendship is quite fragile atm? And yeah added to the fact that he’s been totally out of the loop and he could be bitter abt that… If my interpretation is correct, then it’s not even out of character of him to react like that, it’s just… Not what he should’ve done but did bc ppl in real life aren’t perfect nor always up to the expectations we build for them?

What I absolutely can’t understand is how ppl are questionning how David Hourregue and Niiels are directing and writing their show when we don’t have all the cards in hands yet. And even dm them to answer abt their writing??? Wtf guys this isn’t Voltron here, we don’t harass the prod, be classy.

And finally, if you’re not a French LGBT+ person, I beg you to not talk abt how France is or isn’t in term of LGBT+ rights and views. Behave.

summary: A real life Skam love story.
title: A real life Skam love story.
body:
Everybody is talking often about fiction relationships. I want to tell you the story of Lilo and Carrie. LILO seems the most on Eliott. Carrie has many properties of Lucas.
Carrie and Lilo meet on 10 March 2018 in Amsterdam. LILO was not present in a good mental state. LILO has symptoms of autism and bipolar. LILO can partly live with that. LILO is Christian and LGBT.
Sometimes, Lilo good days. Then the sun shines. On her bad days she can’t get out of bed. The world is too loud. Relationships and Lilo don’t work well. LILO can nothing with relationships. LILO has had multiple relationships. 1 of 2 years. And a few short relationships. But with every relationship there was rejection. LILO had given up hope. Until Lilo Carrie met on 10 March. LILO is hardly remembered of that evening. However, Lilo the face of Carrie. Carrie made something in Lilo. LILO and Carrie see each other a long time. When Lilo and Carrie each other see it is not the right time. LILO is a fragile relationship. A relationship that can go out any time. Her friend always has comments. LILO does not feel loved.It is 26 October when Lilo and Carrie see each other again. LILO and Carrie are included in the same LGBT group. A Christian. There is talk that night evening. LILO is there with her friend and her best friend. He knows already what Lilo longer. Is there on the bad days. But there is also on the good days. He sees how Lilo radiates. He also knows that Lilo Carrie has previously seen. That night are Lilo and Carrie in the same group. LILO and Carrie understand each other well. It seems as if it’s supposed to be. The girlfriend of Lilo notes it. LILO has it also by. LILO decide to let that Lilo from her friend. Yet when the two kissing Lilo feels nothing. Her friend notices. LILO sees how Carrie looks at Lilo. There is clearly more from the side of Carrie. LILO let it go. But when Lilo with her friends in the rain runs and Carrie runs next to her. LILO can’t look away. Carrie draws more and more the attention of Lilo. It was the 8th of december. 8 december saw Carrie and Lilo meet again. LILO was not very stable. The winter months were always very debilitating for Lilo. LILO was more sensitive to emotions. Pulled the very long days. The period around the holidays were never the favorite days of Lilo. LILO and Carrie would only agree. That did not happen. The girlfriend of Lilo came between. Lilo knew that Carrie accepted that lilo. However, more for Lilo felt. When Lilo and Carrie get the chance to talk only word everything clear for Lilo. All the pieces of the puzzle fall into place. Yet are looking for Lilo to a stable relationship. A relationship where lilo now in it. However, that relationship of short duration. A week later break Lilo and her friend the relationship. The excuse. LILO and her friend to have few things in common. With Christmas is Lilo alone. With old and new hits Lilo again depressed and this time it takes 3 weeks to come on top. In that period, Lilo much contact with Carrie. Carrie often sends her a message. LILO and Carrie also see each other often. It looks like it now as is supposed to be. It is 14 January when Lilo and Carrie kissing each other for the first time. It is at a prom. Carrie lilo had asked at the last minute. That evening in breda Lilo and Carrie tell each other that they have fallen for each other very hard. Carrie may her luck. Lilo is the first girlfriend of Carrie. LILO is the first love of Carrie. LILO asks carrie if she does. A friend with mental problems. A friend who sometimes very runs to struggle with her eating disorder. And when Lilo panic attacks. Can Carrie that do accept. It’s on a Sunday afternoon in Utrecht when Carrie tells lilo that Lilo is the true for her. That Carrie with Lilo wants to be old. As Carrie and Lilo are young. They belong together. They love each other. But most of all. Nothing stands in the way of them.

_______________________________________________________-

Why am I telling you this story. Some think that the story of Lucas and Eliott is based not on facts. But if you read this. Do you believe in love. Do you believe in the fact that people with mental problems in a relationship. I’m lilo. I have on my 16th I never been told that my panic attacks would come. That I will have blackouts for the rest of my life. I am emotionally unstable. However, I have found the one. I’m almost 26. About a little over a week. Sometimes it takes years before you find the true. However, that opportunity though. I found my Lucas on 1 of the bad moments in my life. But at that time it was not the right time. Carrie has waited on me. Carrie told me that they last even longer on I would expect if it had to. Carrie is the love of my life. And one day, she is the person with whom I’m getting married.
